sentences.sContent: The success in the Middle East redounds to his benefit.
sentences.sCn: 中东地区的该项成就对他有益。

synos.tran: 有助于；报偿，报应；被转移

trans.tranOther: If an action or situation redounds to your benefit or advantage, it gives people a good impression of you or brings you something that can improve your situation
